name: Death Sentence
desc: You can target your Fiend monsters that are banished and/or in your GY, up to the number of "Destiny Board" and "Spirit Message" cards you control; add them to your hand. You can send this card from the field to the GY; place 1 "Spirit Message" card from your hand, Deck, or GY face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone. (This is treated as being placed by the effect of "Destiny Board".) You can only use 1 "Death Sentence" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
str1: Return Fiend monsters to the hand
